name: amitim-activity-finder-pwa
description: A PWA to search and filter classes and activities for 'Amitim' members.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp *.html dist/ 2>/dev/null || : && cp *.tsx dist/ 2>/dev/null || : && cp *.ts dist/ 2>/dev/null || : && cp -r components dist/ 2>/dev/null || : && cp -r services dist/ 2>/dev/null || : && cp -r public/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || :
